name: Cloudy Eyes
description:
On this labyrinth, your goal is to reach the center in order to discover your true purpose and meaning.

In Cloudy Eyes your goal is to beat a series of puzzles while learning about the playable character´s history and goal.

We are a group of students studying Videogame Development in Argentina, and this is our first Global Game Jam proyect. We hope you can enjoy our game, and we would appreciate if you could comment below what you liked or disliked about out game, in order to continue improving in next Global Game Jams.
